title: Bots in ranked tft?
body: Ranked tft lately has had all these players that are river sprites with no icon picture, in one game i had 7 of them all no icon river sprites, they never chat, all have what look like generated names(similar jargon), all have odd movement on item wheel picks and after battle. They also seem to have a uncanny ability to get level 2 lux. What is up with these bots? I would really like to hear from riot member about this.

replies.body: I'm running into the exact same situation, I would love a response from Riot about what is going on. Every game is filled with these players.

yeah same thing over here tried to play two ranked games today and it was just me and 7 lvl 1 river sprites i came last both times , atleast make it so the accounts have to be lvl 30 for ranked or something
